page.title: 13Recreation in the Wolfords
page.content: The Women's Institute and Over 60's meet regularly and provide speakers, outings and general jollity for members from the Wolfords. Much recreation is based at home, with gardening, pets, riding, pigeon racing being popular. The library van calls fortnightly in the Wolfords and monthly in Todenham. Two concerts were held this year in Great Wolford Church. Sport is quite popular with the fire college sports centre nearby, and tennis, football and bowls in Shipston on Stour and Moreton on Marsh. There are two private tennis courts and four swimming pools in the block. The nearest cinema is in Banbury and people attend theatres at Stratford on avon, Chipping Norton and Oxford.
